title: Stalker!
description: Women are being murdered with ruthless efficiency by a killer who leaves no clues as to who he might be. Kristy Maxwell whose team of investigators are hindered by a senior officer with political ambitions, must find the killer before anyone else dies. In the meantime, her cheating lover becomes a rape victim, while one of her best friends is pestered by someone who is also stalking her. When another murder victim is found near the large estate where Kristy and a number of other women live, she must face the increasing likelihood that the killer is operating much closer to her home than she would like.
author: Eve Adam
